website_summaries.verdict: The K3 has above-average overall speed, but its disorganized menu and limited range on 5GHz make it only worth the price if you really like the design.
pros: It's fast and consistent on 2.4GHz, and it looks relatively “normal” compared to other futuristic-looking routers
cons: The web interface and app need work
For the price, the long-range speed on 5GHz was disappointing, and it lacks detailed QoS to manage bandwidth
It also doesn't have extra anti-malware features to protect your smart devices

customer_reviews.title: Beware---Phones home to Chinese e-commerce website
customer_reviews.text: I connected this router to my pihole server and noticed with alarm that it incessantly called home to ip.taobao.com. Sending it back...this is router appears to send your browsing info through China. For comparison, tp-link router does not phone home to China.
customer_reviews.author: NavyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps great for small homes and non-gigabit ISPs, not for my situation however
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entry level router for 2-3 bedroom homes that has 100mps internet I am sure. I have relatively large home and gigabit FIOS, just like many other routers including $1K Magnolia router from BestBuy, nothing beats Quantumgateway that comes with FIOS service in power output. The issue that I have with QG is the range. Power decreases drastically on second floor so I am in need of a replacement. I am yet to find one however after trying over a dozen famously reviewed routers..this is no exception.. All the routers overpromise and underdeliver..
customer_reviews.author: Hans Blix (Pol)

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up, performance is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: After connecting this Wifi router to my cable modem and the power plug, it took all of about 5 minutes to set up the 2.4 and 5ghz wifi networks and the guest network. Just followed the quick set up card that came with the router and set it up with a desktop. Then downloaded the Android app and did all the advanced stuff. Very easy to work with and the speeds are incredible. I have a 200 mb/s connection and am getting constant 230+ mb/s downloads with the 5 ghz wifi connection and with a wired connection to the router.
customer_reviews.author: G.E. from HI

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  Manufacture Error.  All devices are melfunctioning.
customer_reviews.text: Price continue to drop down and You think $32 for AC1900 with Intel inside is great deal. Also looks fancy and nice functions (MIMO and others). BUT it is simply JUNK. That's why they keep drop down the price. Wired speed, Wifi signal strength, Bridging, Wifi extending.....etc, none of them are working correctly. Wifi signal is really weak (slower then my AC1200 device), continue to bounce (lost signal and regain), Wifi extention is not working with new firmware, No Bridging function, ....OMG.... it is JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: UncleJ

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't heard of Phicomm routers before but at a price under $60, I had to give it a go. What is great: 1. Nifty LCD display on top of router. 2. Very fast. 3. Great style (unique) What could prove a challenge: 1. Setup wasn't easy but once completed, I found the router menu very complete. 2. WPS has made us lazy. This router doesn't have WPS, so get ready to relearn how to pair devices. What is bad: 1. No telephone customer support. 2. Only 3 LAN ports. Recomendation: BUY
customer_reviews.author: C. Krater

customer_reviews.title: Excellent router at any price
customer_reviews.text: I got this router on sale for under $60 and it is hands down the best router I've ever owned in the 20+ years I've used wifi routers. Easy setup, easy update, solid fast connections for all my devices. I researched this router before buying it and love that it will handle over 120 devices at once thanks to mu-mimo at the maximum speed each device will handle. Gigabit input from my cable modem and output to wired devices. 600 mps on 2.4 Ghz, 1300 mps on 5 Ghz and my 4K TV gets a great picture with no buffering.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie E McBride

customer_reviews.title: great router at a great price
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a replacement for old wifi router and used it to pair with my AC network adaptive. I could not believe that this installed as easily as box said it would. Connect the modem, connect the power, give it a minute, then connect wirelessly and enter to this smart wifi setup through my browser. this covers my house completely. I have wireless coverage throughout my yard and house even including the basement. How refreshing. The coverage has been quite good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Limited feature set, doesn't work for video
customer_reviews.text: So, while this router was very very fast on WiFi performance, the range was limited and any device using a video stream was unreliable. This is probably due to WMM not being set properly. Unfortunately the firmware does not allow you to change WMM settings. For this reason, it's unreliable as a wireless device.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I logged into my router easly this week, and it said my firmware was two years out of date. It is only a year old. So I undated the firmware. Yesterday morning it was working just fine, then it died and would not connect to the Internet. I ordered a new router which will be here tomorrow. I am running on an old router until the new one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gibbon

customer_reviews.title: but I want to switch to something that looks better. Then I found this one
customer_reviews.text: the design of the wifi router is one of the reason for the purchases. I used to have linksys, but I want to switch to something that looks better. Then I found this one. It is a reasonable price and it was a super easy installation process, I am not a computer person, but I am able to install it very quickly. So far, the wifi internet is stable and I am able to stream video without any interruption.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I have had inconsistent results with this router over the last year. I have to reboot it about every 2-3 days. It didn't work with my old fire stick so I bought a new one. It worked for awhile then stopped. It has now stopped working altogether and I have had it just over one year. I am now buying another router :(
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M

customer_reviews.title: It is not working after three month usage
customer_reviews.text: purchased last Apr.2019, and it's been working ok, but it stopped working now - 7/29/2019. the light stayed orange. I did everything (unplug, reset, ...etc) but the blue light never turned on again... pls help me to connect to seller and get refund or something. It has 24 month warranty, but I do not want this product again and just want to return for refund!
customer_reviews.author: YOUNGHO Y.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable + Zero Support Staff
customer_reviews.text: Terribly unreliable. Multiple issues with using the AppleTV remote app which are temporarily remedied by a reboot. Old Asus router does not have this issue. Tried a factory reset and reconfigure which doesn’t help. When nightly automatic reboots don’t prevent the issue. Emailed support 3x over a 45 day period and never got a response!!!! This company is failing
customer_reviews.author: Lance D. Seabourn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: WIFI stops working
customer_reviews.text: The wifi turns off , you have to REBOOT daily. I have two of these (Upstairs and downstairs) BOTH of them turn of the wifi .. I will have to replace them . As these are WIFI routers it is important to have reliable WIFI reception! My coworker has one also and his does the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anderson

customer_reviews.title: After having issues with multiple cable modem & wifi routers ...
customer_reviews.text: After having issues with multiple cable modem & wifi routers, I tried this hoping Intel's involvement would make a difference for extending my wifi access, but had no luck and had to set up the router multiple times and finally decided I was not going to invest more time. Even tried an ethernet connection with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product, buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router 2 years ago and all of a sudden the router needs an update, but now the app in my phone won't update and it's completely nonexistent on the Google app store now. I tried calling support but no adequate contacts are available online. This seems to be a Chinese company. This router was fine at first but very spotty connection a lot of the time. Now, I have to go buy a new router and it will not be from Amazon. Amazon has officially lost my faith in the products they sell. Often times products are coming from China and they do not disclose that.
customer_reviews.author: Kai A

customer_reviews.title: Great router. No problems.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The wifi works very good and was able to put out some impressive speeds. I will update my review as I continue to use it. UPDATE 1- I have had this router for about a month now. Never has it dropped a connection, and is capable of supporting 10 devices easily.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: ... other router always gave me headaches & was a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: My other router always gave me headaches & was a waste of time, so I decided to get this as a replacement. I've had this router now for several days, and it works well (so far). I've experienced no issues with signal or connecting. Setup was simple, and after connecting, it automatically checked for updates. The interface shows icons during setup so that I didn’t have to dig through menus to find basic settings. We have 5 people in our house streaming, playing games, surfing, etc. This router has been able to handle all us using it at once. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Will Y.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: When it works it works well, just never know when it will work. Not consistent, had to reboot the router several times a day. It was intermittent and inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Sugga

customer_reviews.title: Save your money on this one- don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this wireless router for quite a while now and I do not recommend buying it. At all. It’s constantly going in and out. We reset it daily, just about.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Retracting 1st review - unit was defective
customer_reviews.text: Replacement is working great so far. It's very sleek & beautiful and a great space saver! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Freak

customer_reviews.title: The router is with great outlook and perfectly functional
customer_reviews.text: The router looks so beautiful, smooth surface and modern design. The package is also an A plus one, if you look inside, you'll find it's even better than the Apple product's packages. Also, the router is perfectly functional and easy to setup. We use it for about one week and it's much better than our former one, which was also a $100 product. I would say this one is so worth of the price, I'd enjoy it and recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great router.
customer_reviews.text: My old router was ancient and was not supporting our network well. This router is very easy to setup and the connection is fast. It was simple to set it up by following instruction and it was up and running within 5 minutes. I am very happy with this purchase. It is a great router and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: The wifi becomes unstable after three weeks. Then it completely disconnected every day. I had to reboot the router every day to get the wifi working. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hsiang Wei

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Mega cheap and very fast. Upgraded to gigabit internet and my old router could not handled the speed even hardwired with gigabit ports. This one no problem at all. Has the same chip in as the MUCH more expensive Asus router
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and working okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice Design and easy to set up with my cable modem.. just one thing.. it only has 4 ports (included 1 WAN) .. other than that.. it is working good.
customer_reviews.author: dadamonkey

customer_reviews.title: Not connecting to cable modem!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 7 month ago, and now it wont connect to my cable modem any more.... Had to reinstall my old router...When it was working, it was really good.There is no support from the factory. Would not buy again. Th.
customer_reviews.author: Th-Man

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: works alright. if you get disconnected from your isp you have to reset this though.
customer_reviews.author: SwBs

customer_reviews.title: no-no
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to use it as an AP, what means I only need to extend the main router with kc3 wifi. After finding out how to set it up, it works sometimes only. The wireless connection takes almost one minute, and then there is no internet connection. After 5 minutes, something happens and the internet connection appears. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Best for value.
customer_reviews.text: A Very good router for the price. Great signal and speeds. Only cons for me: slowly at reboots and I wanted more lan ports.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Peniche Santos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Router !
customer_reviews.text: This powerful router delivers highly efficient wireless connections improving our WI-FI coverage. It helps to maintain strong and clear signal on all of our devices at the same time. My son enjoys surfing, playing games and he loves it very much.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Better than K3.
customer_reviews.text: Great Router. Bought the K3 first, and returned. Better range and features. For the price it’s hard to beat. Had a ASUS TM 1900. This is as good, with slightly better range. Easy interface. Single Log in a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Rouse III

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: 8yo router was better, bought another new one much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work good 5 g
customer_reviews.text: On 2.4 works grate my only issu was. 5g. First day it went out i re boot it was working fine then week later 5 g went out agine. See pics. I was using it on a Sharp ruku tv and x box. Tec sport no help all say
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's nice for laptops and cell phones but not good enough ...
customer_reviews.text: It could not handle 3 xbox ones1 laptop and 4 cell phones in a 1100sqft ranch. Xboxes got booted off line. Maybe it's nice for laptops and cell phones but not good enough for gaming. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: Very good value in a next gen router.
customer_reviews.text: very sophisticated router for this price. Easy to set up. Also has an ios app that works well. So far so good after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: My friend that lives upstairs on our apartment building can get signal my old 1 couldn't do that
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works some times, not all the time
customer_reviews.text: The WiFi keeps dropping, I’m supposed to have 230Mbps, and it drops to 3Mbps. I keep having to rebooting it and occasionally it works and usually it doesn’t. I do factory reset, it works for a few days then it drops again.
customer_reviews.author: Jad J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good product. Easy to setup. No drops i have noticed.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This router makes my internet speed much faster and stronger!! No issue so far.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne L

customer_reviews.title: This product is very good, and it has been tested for a period ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good, and it has been tested for a period of time with excellent results, strong signals and easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: L.C

customer_reviews.title: i like
customer_reviews.text: This is very useful. I am using a lot of people. This is a lot faster. I am very happy. like very much
customer_reviews.author: tengkaizhu

customer_reviews.title: Works great cover large house
customer_reviews.text: Great router very easy installation. Cover large home 2 floors. Great value for price!
customer_reviews.author: ziv avital

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: The signal is strong and doesn't drop. I'm satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and get connected with my devices
customer_reviews.text: It’s a router. It gives me internet and doesn’t make me angry. Easy to set up and get connected with my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad for streaming and works in few hours not better than asus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice UI
customer_reviews.text: has an incredible amount of features for the price . Nice modern look
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router and could not get it to connect to internet, after talking to technical support, it was determined that the unit was bad, they sent me another unit over night and had same issue with new one. It did not work with my Spectrum modem. Returned both units, bought me a Netgear Nighthawk AC1750 Smart Dual Band WiFi Router (R6700). Works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lrodri

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Linked easily to my wifi extender and gives me a great internet coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very good router. Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Received on second day. Very good router. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: YI

customer_reviews.title: Speed
customer_reviews.text: Works has expected, i like this product with no problems at all in my 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a year and a half and then stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a mistake to have bought. Wi-Fi signal drops continuously. Major issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alrick

customer_reviews.title: a good buy but not the best WiFi Service
customer_reviews.text: its low cost makes it a good buy but if you want increased range it's not for you. the 5GHz band is 10dB lower than the ASUS AC3100 and 5dB lower for the 2.3GHz band. the router only has three Ethernet ports and was about as fast as the ASUS
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Majestic

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This router is amazing. My old router failed on one of its channels, but no one could tell me why. This had great reviews, was low-priced, was easy to set up, and gives me WAY faster speeds than what I was getting before. I recommend this to everyone at work now. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jian Li

customer_reviews.title: Great router for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took barely 24 hours to get delivered. Super sleek and extremely simple to set up. Within minutes of getting it unwrapped and plugged in I had all my devices connected and streaming videos or playing games online, etc. No packet loss. Intuitive UI. Good range in both bandwidths. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage area
customer_reviews.text: Amazing router. Easy to connect. Greater coverage area all my home recived 5G network even in concrete room. Great handling with multi users no buffering on streeming video even 8 devices are connected
customer_reviews.author: Kok0man

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery. GF isn't a Tech Head but took it upon herself to setup before I got home, had zero problems. So far no problems with streaming on any devices. Added bonus it's pretty slick looking.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a much larger home where my previous router was not providing the strength needed. One of these Phicomm routers did the job of my previous two routers. It arrived in two days and took minutes to set up. I am not a tech savvy person so the instructions and ease of use made all the difference. Not only is this a great router, but it has a great look as well.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Prothero

product_meta.title: PHICOMM K3 AC3150 Dual Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Smart Router (Space Silver)
product_meta.description: Style:K3The Phicomm K3 router combines cutting edge technology with Scandinavian design. Engineered with unprecedented know-how, it drives the concept of "smart home" to a new dimension. A unique chipset greatly enhances the WiFi performance through maintaining stable capacity while handling more devices. Driven by MU-MIMO technology, connections run simultanenously at stable high speed. Beamforming accurately directs signals to reduce interference and improve range. Enjoy being well-connected at home with the Phicomm K3.
feature_bullets: 3.5" TFT LCD screen shows WiFi connectivity and router status; 3 touch keys allow easy and accurate operation.
Advanced Broadcom BCM4709 Cortex A9 dual-core CPU and 512MB RAM, allowing more devices to connect simultaneously.
Simultaneous dual-band speed up to 3167Mbps( 2.4GHz 1000Mbps and 5GHz 2167Mbps).
USB 3.0 with TUXERA drive, 1 Gigabit WAN + 3 Gigabit LAN with up to 1000 Mbps WAN-LAN throughput.
8 Built-in high-gain antennas offer maximum signal coverage and strong reliability.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
